name: Drill City
description:
Hello there, you happen to be just the right candidate as our new mayor of the Drill City. Can you take us deep down to the core? Can you manage your resources well? And in the end, will it be all worth it? If you think you can not, don't worry, I'll take a good care of you. I won't abandon you, even if you'll get annoyed by me. I don't care you're getting insane from my voice. We're good friends, aren't we? :)

Version 1.1 was released after the jam, but fixes a potential softlock, where resources would get eaten up when upgrading drill but not having enough energy.
Version 1.2 was released after the jam, but fixes clicking into the right down corner on small displays.
